revision.text:
As you earn achievements, you gain up to 100% (per region) more [[Poké Dollar|Money]], [[Dungeon Tokens]] and Experience from all sources. The '''Achievement Tracker''' is unlocked after catching 110 total Pokémon. There is an additional 100% Achievement Bonus obtainable from non-regional Achievements. Thus, the maximum Achievement bonus at any time is always as follows:

\text{Maximum Achievement Bonus} = \text{100%} \times \text{Region Number} + \text{100%}

==Achievements== ===Money=== {| class="wikitable" ! Name !! Description !! Bonus Percentage |- | My First Hundo || Obtain 100 Pokédollars || +0.23% |- | I Should Buy a PokéMart || Obtain 1,000 Pokédollars || +0.45% |- | A Small Fortune || Obtain 10,000 Pokédollars || +0.68% |- | Annual Wage || Obtain 100,000 Pokédollars || +0.90% |- | Pfft, I Don't Need a Bike Voucher || Obtain 1,000,000 Pokédollars || +1.13% |- | A billion Poképennies || Obtain 10,000,000 Pokédollars || +2.26% |} ===Token=== {| class="wikitable" ! Name !! Description !! Bonus Percentage |- | Dungeon Time || Obtain 100 Dungeon Tokens || +0.23% |- | Token Collector || Obtain 1,000 Dungeon Tokens || +0.45% |- | Dungeon Grinder || Obtain 10,000 Dungeon Tokens || +0.68% |- | Dungeon Master || Obtain 100,000 Dungeon Tokens || +0.90% |- | Dungeon Master || Obtain 1,000,000 Dungeon Tokens || +1.13% |} ===Attack=== {| class="wikitable" ! Name !! Description !! Name !! Description !! Name !! Description !! This can't be healthy || Dig deeper 1,000 times || +1.35% |} ===Max Level Oak Item=== {| class="wikitable" ! Name !! Description !!
